java.debugger.configuration.title: Java: Debugger Configuration
java.debugger.configuration.logLevel.des: Minimum level of debugger logs that are sent to VS Code.
java.debugger.configuration.showHex.desc: Show numbers in hex format in "Variables" viewlet.
java.debugger.configuration.showQualifie: Show fully qualified class names in "Variables" viewlet.
java.debugger.configuration.maxStringLen: The maximum length of strings displayed in "Variables" or "Debug Console" viewlet, strings longer than this length will be trimmed, if 0 no trim is performed.
java.debugger.configuration.enableHotCod: Enable hot code replace for Java code.
java.debugger.configuration.enableRunDeb: Enable the run and debug code lens providers over main methods.
